wikipedia_page.main: John David Lumsden (15 December 1960 – 22 April 2016) was a Scottish footballer who played in the English Football League for Stoke City.

response: John Lumsden was an Irish physician.
John Lumsden may also refer to:
*John Lumsden of Auchinleck Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland in 1746
* 22 April 2016: John Lumsden, 55, Stoke City midfielder.
